bibl.title: In Terms of Fate: A Survey of the Indigenous Egyptian Contribution to Ancient Astrology in Light of Papyrus CtYBR inv. 1132(B).
bibl.note: Gathers the native Egyptian astrological documentation. - See pp. 11-19: The Contemporary Background [the impact of astrology on the Roman world].
bibl.seg: BOHLEKE Briant, In Terms of Fate: A Survey of the Indigenous Egyptian Contribution to Ancient Astrology in Light of Papyrus CtYBR inv. 1132(B).
Gathers the native Egyptian astrological documentation. - See pp. 11-19: The Contemporary Background [the impact of astrology on the Roman world].
